array.item: 好。Hǎo. Good, okay.
不好。Bù hǎo. Not good, not okay.
好不好？Hǎo bù hǎo? Okay?
很好。Hěn hǎo. Very good.
你好。Nǐ hǎo. Hello.
你好吗？Nǐ hǎo ma? Are you well?
你们好。Nǐmen hao. Hi, guys.
你们好吗？Nǐmen hǎo ma? Are you guys well?
我很好。Wǒ hěn hǎo. I am very good.
我们很好，谢谢。Wǒmen hěn hǎo, xièxie. We are very good, thanks.
我们在哪儿？Wǒmen zài nǎ’er? Where are we?
我们在饭店。Wǒmen zài fàn diàn. We are at a restaurant.
你吃什么？Nǐ chī shénme? What are you eating?
我吃米饭，你呢？Wǒ chī mǐ fàn, nǐ ne? I am eating rice, what about you?
我不想吃。Wǒ bù xiǎng chī. I do not want to eat.
你喝水吗？Nǐ hē shuǐ ma? Are you drinking water?
我不喜欢水。Wǒ bù xǐhuan shuǐ. I do not like water.
我喝茶。Wǒ hē chá. I am drinking tea.
这是什么菜？Zhè shì shénme cài? What dish is this?
这是水果，它很好吃！Zhè shì shuǐguǒ, tā hěn hǎo chī! This is fruit, it is very delicious!
